duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct Cybersecurity risk assessments and evaluate Navy systems.
Assist in drafting Cybersecurity risk reports and analyzing assessment and authorization documentation.
Evaluate program security compliance, support program briefs, and coordinate program security documentation.
Provide A&A and Cybersecurity support, including RMF for DoD IT, compliance with security technical implementation guides, and security test and evaluation.
Interact with clients to perform audits and brief client leadership on vulnerabilities.
Prepare brief slides and summary of findings analyses.

education_certification.credential: IAT Level III/IAM Level II Certification
